Class SimMetricsComparator_ImplBase

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.SimilarityMeasure, de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TermSimilarityMeasure, de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasure
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CosineSimMetricsComparator, DiceSimMetricComparator, OverlapCoefficientSimMetricComparator

    public abstract class SimMetricsComparator_ImplBase
extends de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.api.TextSimilarityMeasureBase
    Abstract base class for all similarity measures that are based on the SimMetrics library (Chapman, Norton, and Ciravegna, 2005). Chapman S., Norton B., and Ciravegna F. (2005). Armadillo: Integrating Knowledge for the Semantic Web. In Proceedings of the Dagstuhl Seminar in Machine Learning for the Semantic Web, Wadern, Germany. (pdf)
